name: TO-FU POP!
description:
▼△▼ NEWS ▲▽▲
Angelia & Pets become ‘'Angelia & Pets TO-FU’’ and coming out in the game! 

Angelia & Pets is an original carry wear brand from Taipei Taiwan, established by a passionate design team since 2010...
http://www.angeliapets.com

KIDO×TO-FU OYAKO
http://www.angeliapets.com/index.html

▼▲▼ TO-FU POP! ▲▼▲
Completely free! No in-app purchases!
Play with the world famous "TO-FU OYAKO" and their many TO-FU friends in this fast-paced, exciting Jump-game!

With your favorite TO-FU characters you can -- POP! STEP! JUMP!

TOFU OYAKO is the fairy-like family born from the Tofu we eat.
If a TOFU falls their head will break! That‘s why their hearts are always beating so fast...

Jump higher than everyone and become ultimate "TO-FU POP!" master!!
Check your rank by tapping the CROWN icon on the start page!

If you fall game over...

▽Platform
iPhone 4S and after

▽iOS
7.0 and after

▽contact for game
support_tofu@ritterz.com

▽Other
This game do not require network to play after downloading.
